greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} 1/(1 - 3^(k-1)*x^k).
comment: In general, if g.f. = Product_{k>=1} 1/(1 - d^(k-1)*x^k), where d > 1, then a(n) ~ sqrt(d-1) * polylog(2, 1/d)^(1/4) * d^(n - 1/2) * exp(2*sqrt(polylog(2, 1/d)*n)) / (2*sqrt(Pi)*n^(3/4)).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 09 2018
